DOC.brief_summary: Primary object : Evaluate pharmacokinetic property administer S-pantoprazole 20mg Pantoprazole 40mg healthy male subject Secondary object : Evaluate safety administer S-pantoprazole 20mg Pantoprazole 40mg healthy male subject
DOC.brief_title: Investigate Pharmacokinetics Between S-pantoprazole 20mg Pantoprazole 40mg Healthy Male Subjects
DOC.criteria: Adult healthy male 20 45 year screen . BMI : 19kg/m2 ~ 26kg/m2 Blood Pressure : `` 140 > sit SBP ≥ 90mmHg , 90 > sit DBP ≥ 60mmHg '' Have history significant hepatic , renal , gastrointestinal , pulmonary , musculoskeletal , endocrine , neuropsychiatric , hematologic , cardiovascular disease Have gastrointestinal disease ( ex : Crohn 's disease , gastrointestinal ulcer ) surgery ( except Appendectomy , Hernia repair ) affect absorption medication Have history GERD , Gastric ulcer , Duodenal ulcer Hypersensitivity reaction drug clinically significant hypersensitivity reaction history benzimidazole ( ex : pantoprazole , NSAID , antibiotic ) Have history drug abuse Unusual diet affect absorption , distribution , metabolism , excretion medication Subject treat investigational drug within 90 day administration investigational drug Subject take inhibitor inducer drug metabolize enzyme ( Barbiturates etc . ) within 30days Previously donate whole blood within 60 day component blood within 30 day transfusion within 30 day Subject take habitually caffeine ( caffeine > 5 units/day ) Subject drunken habitually ( alcohol > 21 units/week , 1 unit = pure alcohol 10ml ) unable quit drinking study smoker Subjects deem ineligible investigator base reason
